tool_description: Communicate incidents and maintenance with a hosted status page
name: Statuspal
title: Statuspal

api_list.name: getStatusPageStatus

required_parameters.name: statusPageSubdomain
required_parameters.description: The subdomain of your status page (subdomain.statuspal.io)

api_list.name: /hello
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://statuspal.p.rapidapi.com/hello"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "statuspal.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://statuspal.p.rapidapi.com/hello"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "statuspal.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

optional_parameters.name: before
optional_parameters.description: Used as a cursor for pagination.

optional_parameters.name: after
optional_parameters.description: Used as a cursor for pagination.

optional_parameters.name: limit
optional_parameters.description:
Set the number of subscriptions to return in the response.
This defaults to 20 items, and can be a maximum of 100.
